data.text: Mfa ɔkyena nhoahoa wo ho,
Ma ɔfoforɔ nkamfo wo; na ɛnyɛ wʼankasa;
Ɛboɔ mu yɛ duru, na anwea yɛ adesoa,
Abufuo tirim yɛ den, na abufuhyeɛ sɛe adeɛ,
Animka a ɛda edwa
Apirakuro a ɛfiri adamfo nkyɛn no yɛ
Ɛwoɔ nyɛ deɛ wameeɛ akɔnnɔ,
Onipa a wayera ne fie ɛkwan,
Ngo ne aduhwam ma akoma ani gye,
Nnyaa wʼadamfo ne wʼagya adamfo mu,
Me ba, hunu nyansa na ma mʼakoma ani nnye;
Mmadwemma hunu asiane na wɔhinta,
Fa atadeɛ a ɛhyɛ obi a ɔdi ɔhɔhoɔ akagyinamu;
Sɛ obi team hyira ne yɔnko anɔpahema a,
Ɔyere ntɔkwapɛfoɔ te sɛ
sɛ wopata no a, ɛte sɛ deɛ wopata mframa
Dadeɛ se dadeɛ,
Deɛ ɔhwɛ borɔdɔma dua so no bɛdi ɛso aba,
Sɛdeɛ nsuo yi animdua kyerɛ no,
Sɛdeɛ Owuo ne Ɔsɛeɛ bo ntɔ da no,
Kyɛmferɛ wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sikakɔkɔɔ,
Sɛ wowɔ ɔkwasea wɔ ɔwaduro mu,
Ma ɛnyɛ wo asɛnhia sɛ wobɛhunu wo nnwankuo tebea,
ɛfiri sɛ, ahonya ntena hɔ daa,
Sɛ wotwa ɛserɛ no na foforɔ fifiri
ɛnneɛ nnwammaa no bɛma wo ntoma,
Wobɛnya mmirekyie nufosuo bebree
